# {{lb|zh|archaic}} Guding [[garrison]] (in present day [[w:Hebei|Hebei]])

===Usage notes===
In ancient times, the swords produced in Guding [[garrison]] (in present day [[w:Hebei|Hebei]]) were famous for being sharp.
